product_entries.section_context_for_this_product_block: INSTRUMENTATION > MISCELLANEOUS ITEMS AND DEVICES > JUNCTION BOX INSTALLATION > GENERAL SITE WORK
product_entries.full_product_description: Identification of instrument items wherever required including supply of approved  colour of paint/ paints (Fluorescent), painting of tag number (approx 25-50 mm high)on instrument item like transmitter, switches, level gauges, control valves etc. as specified by Engineer-in-Charge.
product_entries.feature_or_specifications: paint type: fluorescent, feature: supply of approved colour of paint/paints, feature: painting of tag number on instrument item like transmitter, switches, level gauges, control valves etc., specification: as specified by Engineer-in-Charge

product_entries.full_product_description: CHIEF CONTROLLER OF EXPLOSIVE( CCE) CERTIFICATES FOR FIELD ELECTRICAL/ ELECTRONIC INSTRUMENTS & ACCESSORIES AND EQUIPMENTS
product_entries.core_product_name: chief controller of explosive certificates for field electrical or electronic instruments and accessories and equipments
product_entries.acronymed_core_product_name: cce certificates for field electrical or electronic instruments and accessories and equipments

product_entries.section_context_for_this_product_block: INSTRUMENTATION > MISCELLANEOUS ITEMS AND DEVICES > JUNCTION BOX INSTALLATION > GENERAL SITE WORK
product_entries.full_product_description: Obtaining  certificate of approval from Chief Controller Of Explosives( CCE) for field electrical/electronic  instruments & accessories  and equipments  based on type test certificate made available from the instrument vendors including submission of  application to statutory authorities , necessary fees, all test certificates, equipment drawings in required volumes, interaction with the authorities, follow-up for  approval, obtaining necessary approval certificate before energization of field electrical/electronic  instruments & accessories  and equipments.
product_entries.core_product_name: certificate of approval from chief controller of explosives for field electrical or electronic instruments and accessories and equipments
product_entries.feature_or_specifications: based on: type test certificate made available from the instrument vendors, includes: submission of application to statutory authorities, necessary fees, all test certificates, equipment drawings in required volumes, interaction with the authorities, follow-up for approval, obtaining necessary approval certificate before energization

original_rows.3: Identification of instrument items wherever required including supply of approved  colour of paint/ paints (Fluorescent), painting of tag number (approx 25-50 mm high)on instrument item like transmitter, switches, level gauges, control valves etc. as specified by Engineer-in-Charge.
CHIEF CONTROLLER OF EXPLOSIVE( CCE) CERTIFICATES FOR FIELD ELECTRICAL/ ELECTRONIC INSTRUMENTS & ACCESSORIES AND EQUIPMENTS

Obtaining  certificate of approval from Chief Controller Of Explosives( CCE) for field electrical/electronic  instruments & accessories  and equipments  based on type test certificate made available from the instrument vendors including submission of  application to statutory authorities , necessary fees, all test certificates, equipment drawings in required volumes, interaction with the authorities, follow-up for  approval, obtaining necessary approval certificate before energization of field electrical/electronic  instruments & accessories  and equipments.
